Package DataAccess

Class ClientDAO

java.lang.Object
DataAccess.AbstractDAO<Client>
DataAccess.ClientDAO
public class ClientDAO extends AbstractDAO<Client>
The class handles database operations for Client objects. It extends AbstractDAO<Client> to inherit common data access functionalities.

    • clientExists

      public Client clientExists(Client client)
      Checks if a client with the same name and email already exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      client - the Client object to check for existence based on its properties
      Returns:
      the matching Client if found otherwise null
